. Donald Rumsfeld said`` it's possible'' that decisions on troop levels in Iraq may have been the biggest mistake of the war. He maintained that the war overall was not a mistake. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said.
